header.title: PORTFOLIO.
header.text_header: Web developer specialized in creating and optimizing software solutions in frontend and backend. My passion for computer science has led me to a self-taught career, always seeking new opportunities to innovate and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends. My creative approach and ability to adapt to new challenges have been key in my professional development. Thanks to my self-taught quality and a learning-focused mindset, I am starting a business focused on articles about music groups from around the world. I am collaborating with Guillermo and Javier, who have joined me as partners to enhance their blog's reputation and increase its traffic.

aboutme.text_aboutme: I began my professional career due to my burning passion for learning, taking on new challenges, and continuously improving my skills in programming, logic, and performance. My journey in this field is not limited to fulfilling a dream of working in front of a computer; it is based on my determination to excel and my desire to share my knowledge with the world. Computer science is not just a profession for me; it is a way of life and a true passion. Even when I am not formally working, my commitment persists. Day after day, I dedicate time to study, explore the documentation of the latest technologies, stay informed about emerging trends, and constantly seek opportunities for innovation. My self-taught approach has not only allowed me to acquire valuable skills on my own but has also driven me to overcome obstacles and bring a fresh and creative approach to the projects I engage in. I am convinced that this passion and constant commitment are qualities that can make a difference in any professional environment. With 5 years of experience working in companies, I have specialized in creating and optimizing software solutions in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, PHP, and NodeJS Express, among others. In my last role at Previlabor, I contributed significantly to improving internal processes, with notable achievements such as implementing an automatic document generation system and a RESTful web API service for Laboratorios Echevarne, which increased efficiency by over 15%. Additionally, I achieved a significant optimization in the generation of PDF documents in the company's ERP, reducing processing time from one hour to just 4 seconds. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that not only improve operational efficiency but also have a positive impact on revenue and productivity. My experience has allowed me to develop strong skills in problem-solving, process optimization, and teamwork. I am looking for opportunities where I can contribute my web development expertise and continue to grow professionally.

experiences_title.second: Full Stack Developer at Sogeti SL

second: Development of user interfaces and data management using JavaScript and PHP, employing frameworks like React and Laravel and utilizing REST APIs.
third: Development of applications for various departments
Consumption and use of web services
Analysis of created applications and finding solutions for improvement
